forecast.day_comments: Light snow likely.  Cloudy, with a high near 22. South wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 60%. Total daytime snow accumulation of less than a half inch possible.
forecast.night_comments: A chance of snow before 4am, then a slight chance of snow showers after 4am.  Mostly cloudy, with a steady temperature around 26. Southwest wind 11 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 40%. Total nighttime snow accumulation of less than a half inch possible.
